name: Homestart
body:
# Documents related to affordable housing and zoning issues re Peaks Island and City of Portland.

***

## Documents related to the Portland City Housing Committee

The Committee will make recommendations to the City Council re affordable housing policies.

### Meeting on April 4, 2016

As one agenda item on this meeting, representatives from 14 neighborhood associations gave 3-5 minute presentations on affordable housing issues and concerns in their neighborhoods. 

[TW notes on the meeting](https://rawgit.com/teemo48/Homestart/master/Homestart-docs/Wyant%20-%20Housing%20Committee%20meeting%20notes%202016-04-14.pdf)
* Includes summary of the points I made in my 3 minutes on behalf of Peaks Island Council
* Includes many links, including the Housing Committee website
* This document is a handout I prepared to supplement my brief subcommittee report at the Peaks Island Council meeting on April 20, 2016

[Agenda for the Committee meeting on April 4, 2016](https://rawgit.com/teemo48/Homestart/master/Homestart-docs/Housing%20Commite%20agenda%202016-04-14.pdf)
* Includes the names of most of the presenters from the neighborhoods

[City staff memo to the Committee](https://rawgit.com/teemo48/Homestart/master/Homestart-docs/Mary%20Davis%20memo%20to%20Housing%20Committee%202016-04-08.pdf)
* Describes the City's proposal to provide housing to users of City homeless shelters

[Written submission from Back Cove](https://rawgit.com/teemo48/Homestart/master/Homestart-docs/Back%20Cove%20written%20submission%20to%20Housing%20Committee%202016-04-14.pdf)

[Written submission from East Bayside](https://rawgit.com/teemo48/Homestart/master/Homestart-docs/Summary%20of%20Housing%20Comments%20from%20EastBaysiders_w%20selected%20peninsula%20demographics_2016-04-20%20.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
